Merchant information derived from additional information 1

The merchant_id sourced from the dwh_core.payment_instruction_current table. Use case for marketing: To provide cashbacks when a customer purchases a product at a partnering merchant, the partner provides us a list of merchant_ids that we can use to find the relevant transactions.
